Detail.title: MK2-Superlaser
Detail.textDetail: MK2-Superlaser was the primary weapon of the StarKiller Base, a powerful laser weapon. It was powered by eight kyber crystals. Laser beams generated from these crystals were focused and combined into a single blast of incredible power, capable of destroying an entire planet at full output

Detail.title: Energy Supply
Detail.textDetail: As Starkiller Base was charged through the power of stars, it gradually blocked out sunlight until, running at full capacity, it extinguished it completely, leaving the surface in darkness. In order for the weapon to fire, its weapons engineers would induce a breach in the containment field, allowing the collected dark energy to escape the core through the hollow cylindrical opening on the antipodes of the planet relative to the stellar collector. During this process, the dark energy transformed to a state known as "phantom energy", and left the planet behind, tearing a hole through hyperspace along a perfectly linear path.

Detail.title: StarKiller Base
Detail.textDetail:
Starkiller Base was a base located in the forested ice planet of Ilum rich in kyber crystals that was located in the Unknown Regions. The weapon was powered by a type of dark energy called "quintessence".
Starkiller Base was protected by a planetary shield that was strong enough to deflect any bombardment,[11] and could not be penetrated by any ship traveling at sublight speeds.
In addition to the primary weapon and shield control, Starkiller Base's facilities included numerous ship hangars, sanitation infrastructure, amenities for the garrison of stormtroopers, flooding tunnels and a room dedicated to military communications .

InfoDetail.title: TIE-Advanced x1
InfoDetail.textInfoDetail: The TIE Advanced x1, also known as "TIE/x1" or "TIE Interceptor prototype",[6] was an advanced prototype starfighter touted as a replacement for the standard TIE Fighter

InfoDetail.title: TIE/IN starfighter
InfoDetail.textInfoDetail: Interceptors were fast and maneuverable starfighters. They were designed specifically to target, hunt down, and destroy enemy fighters and bombers, hence the name interceptor, and thus were generally unsuited to carrying heavy bombing payloads. Interceptors could also be used for reconnaissance due to their high speed.

Data.Armament: Laser cannons Cluster missile launch equipment

InfoDetail.title: TIE/SA Bomber
InfoDetail.textInfoDetail: The TIE/sa bomber, simply known as the TIE bomber was a larger, less maneuverable TIE starfighter used for destroying large starships and pinpoint-precision bombing. The "sa" in the TIE bomber's designation stood for "surface assault."

InfoDetail.title: TIE/LN Fighter
InfoDetail.textInfoDetail: TIEs were designed to attack in large numbers, overwhelming the enemy craft. Standard attack squadrons consisted of 12 fighters while full attack wings were made up of six squadrons
